events: Began my coding journey with HTML and CSS
Mastered the fundamentals of PHP and JavaScript
Expanded my skills with Python and C#
Created a Python-based scientific calculator named Sci-Cal
Dive into frameworks and libraries like React.js and studied software architecture
Experimented with Node.js and other modern libraries
Built my first backend CRUD API using REST, MySQL, Apache, Node.js, and PHP
Mastered the MERN stack for full-stack development
Developed a student management system, my first project using Git and GitHub for version control
Completed an internship at the Bureau of Animal Industry, creating a PET mobile registration app using .NET MAUI, C#, and .NET Framework
Landed my first role as a Junior App Developer at a private company
Led programming for my thesis project, 'Luntian,' a web-based plant disease detection system using AI and computer vision
Explored Next.js, FastAPI, and LLM AI integration to automate workflows
Graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, earning awards for Best Programmer and Best Thesis
